passages.text:
You wake up in your bed, head aching from a night of gaming. What do you do?
[[go back to sleep->Your Bedroom ]] 
[[wake up]]
passages.name: Your Bedroom

passages.text:
You wake up, your head hurts even more than you thought.
[[go get some asprin]]
[[turn on the tv and relax]]

links.name: turn on the tv and relax
links.link: turn on the tv and relax

passages.name: wake up

passages.text:
You walk to the bathroom ajacent to your room, you open the mirror to your drug cabinet to grab the asprin, then you shut it. As the mirror shuts, you see a shadow behind you momentarily, peaking from the bathroom door. 
[[go investigate shadow]]
[[shake it off and lay down in your bed ->turn on the tv and relax]]

links.name: shake it off and lay down in your bed
links.link: turn on the tv and relax

passages.name: go get some asprin

passages.text:
You lie back down, as you do, you see a shadow peeking in your room out of the corner of your eye. It spooks you. 
[[go investigate the shadow ->go investigate shadow]] 
[[go back to sleep ->Your Bedroom ]]
passages.name: turn on the tv and relax

passages.text:
You peek out of your room to see where the shadow figure went.
[[go to the basement]]
[[go upstairs]]
[[go into the kitchen]]
passages.name: go investigate shadow

passages.text:
You go down the hall and begin to descend your houses old, creaky basement steps. As you continue down, you see the shadow quicklu duck behind a cabinet. 
[[run out of the house]] 
[[approach the shadows hiding area]]
passages.name: go to the basement

passages.text:
You walk around the corner and begin to ascend your houses old, creaky stairs into the upstairs loft. As you go upstairs, you see the shadow quickly duck behind a drawer.
[[run out of the house]] 
[[approach the shadows hiding area]]
passages.name: go upstairs

passages.text:
You walk down the hallway and into the kitchen. You see the shadow figure duck behind a cabitnet.
[[run out of the house]]
[[approach the shadows hiding area]]
passages.name: go into the kitchen

passages.text:
You throw your hands up, flailing them around as you run out the front door of your house,and you smack your head on the glass screen you forgot to open. The shadow approaches you from behind...
[[oh god what is it]]
passages.name: run out of the house

passages.text: You peak around the corner... BAM!!! Your little brother jumps out in a black blanket. You really need to remember that you were asked to baby sit.
passages.name: approach the shadows hiding area

passages.text: You close your eyes, waiting for the inevitable horror...BAM!!! Your little brother jumps out in a black blanket. You really need to remember that you were asked to baby sit.
passages.name: oh god what is it
